resources.string: "Image as an attachment. Sent from Visma Attach"
"Your picture is connected to Visma.net Expense and therefore cannot be changed."

"Please note that pictures not connected to Visma.net Expense, will be deleted from the archive after 6 months. The user of the service is responsible to ensure that pictures sent using the service do not violate the law or good ethics."
"Send pictures of your receipts directly from your mobile to Visma.net Expense"
"Take a picture of your receipt, add more information if required and press send."
"Now your picture has been sent to Visma.net Expense and will be available for your expense."
